duties_responsibilities.duty: Work with program teams to determine device maintenance requirements and create maintenance policies and procedures.
Determine tools and equipment required for in-house maintenance and investigate options for 3rd party service providers.
Implement and perform in-house test and maintenance of devices and components.
Coordinate test and maintenance with 3rd party service providers.
Fulfill ongoing requests for devices and materials and assist users in identifying suitable configurations for their development needs.
Process and manage inbound, outbound, domestic, and international shipments for on-time delivery.
Track device ownership and locations including those at outside labs and test sites.
Maintain inventory, order materials, and coordinate move of devices among sites.
Identify units for secure scrapping, prepare for secure scrap, and coordinate scrap of devices and materials.
Update existing shipping and inventory process documentation and policy, and identify and document process improvements and new policies. Educate team on processes and policies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field
